name: Zombi Friendly Alien Invation
description:
THIS GAME IS FOR "LOW EFFORT JAM 23"

You can play it on browser or download it for PC and Mobile :)

You only have to press a button to turn on the ovni and catch zombies, but you must avoid the bomb!

This game is a little recreation of this game: https://pixxydoesthings.itch.io/cow-abduction
